\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&&& {f(X_i)} \\
	\circlearrowleft & {X_i} & {Y_j} \\
	K & X & Y
	\arrow[hook, from=1-4, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, curve={height=-18pt}, hook, from=1-4, to=3-3]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, curve={height=-18pt}, two heads, from=2-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, hook, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "s", dashed, from=2-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["g"', from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["f"', from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=2-2, to=3]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=2-3, to=0]
	\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=3-1, to=2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
